title: jacko0088
author: jacko0088

content: GRU is NOT a BSC token, but a RVO token. You have to download Revo Core to get a valid address at  https://revo.network/ Make it GRU!Contract address available at https://mainnet.revo.network/contract/034af8020b529ab8ecf3ef4744f6ed45950d97d5/Website coming soonSwap GRU with RVO/BTC/LTC/BNB coming soonIntroducing the first most EPIC free airdrop of the season! It's time to unleash Anouk, our mascot at REVO headquarters! The first crypto-dog ever to be deployed on a newly layer 1 blockchain called REVO ¬†.The Revo Team is excited to announce that we are giving away a generous amount of ¬†100,000 GRU (Anouk Token) per user in our exclusive airdrop event! Why settle for mediocrity when you can aim for the moon? Forget about ordinary coins, because GRU is here to revolutionize the crypto-dogs landscape. üåô And yes, we dare to say it ‚Äì with the upcoming news is even better than #Dogecoin! üêïTo participate in this extraordinary airdrop and get your hands on some GRU, all you need to do is follow these simple steps:Step 1: Make sure you have an RVO address ready to receive the glorious GRU. You can get a RVO wallet at https://revo.network/Step 2: Spread the word about GRU airdrop with your fellow crypto enthusiasts. Share this announcement far and wide ‚Äì let's make it rain GRU together!Step 3: Join Revo TG Channel at https://t.me/revoblockchain/1976 and paste your address followed by your bitcointalk usernameOnce you've completed these steps, get ready to witness the rise of GRU in your wallet. üìà Let the power of GRU fuel our crypto journey!Remember, this airdrop won't last forever. Seize the opportunity now, before it's too late! ‚è∞Will you ever be able to unlock one of the 21 secret NFTs? ¬†Let's make it GRU-ing!

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.created_time: July 04, 2023, 05:43:14 AMLast edit: July 04, 2023, 06:34:12 AM by Daltonik
comments.body: The project has been in existence since October 2022, to be honest, I thought you should have more followers on Twitter. I did not find data on the maximum supply of RVO coins, the ecosystem tab on the site says that soon, it is strange that with such a voluminous whitepaper you do not have a description of the ecosystem.PS. Ok, I found a description of tokenomics in the whitepaper of pages 54-55 and there is a total supply of tokens in the amount of 105 million.

comments.author: jacko0088
comments.created_time: July 04, 2023, 06:34:33 AMLast edit: July 04, 2023, 07:17:25 AM by jacko0088
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on July 04, 2023, 05:43:14 AMThe project has been in existence since October 2022, to be honest, I thought you should have more followers on Twitter. I did not find data on the maximum supply of RVO coins, the ecosystem tab on the site says that soon, it is strange that with such a voluminous whitepaper you do not have a description of the ecosystem.REVO layer 1 itself, was live in beta/alphanet since 2020, actually marketing side of it it's something we should make amend. We've been so busy actually devloping things either for clients and community that we left the promotion part aside.Ecosystem page is empty sice it's meant to be a page with links related to exchanges, swappers, services and community driven projects. You can find data related to max supply, distribuition and everything at the chapter "Economic Model", or a quick look can be given at https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5458047.0.For RVO we'll have a total max supply of 213,895,000 coins. GRU instead its a pretty basic token contract code, mintable, with current supply of 21,000,000,000 GRU.Contract code is pretty simple and publicly available at https://github.com/revolutionchain/anouk/blob/main/contract.solWe're a little company, trying our best with resources we have. We never got funded, never did an ICO or IPO or similar. And the best resource we have right now are blockchain core devs. Basically nerds on keyboards, not marketers yet

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Thank you for the airdrop 100,000 Anouk(GRU) that you received, but in order for it to appear in your wallet, you need to add a new token to the wallet on the ERC Tokens wallet tab, information about the data of which in our case is GRU can be taken on the Anouk contract page https://mainnet.revo.network/contract/034af8020b529ab8ecf3ef4744f6ed45950d97d5/

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.created_time: July 05, 2023, 05:42:32 AMLast edit: July 05, 2023, 06:00:39 AM by bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on July 04, 2023, 09:54:34 AMThank you for the airdrop 100,000 Anouk(GRU) that you received, but in order for it to appear in your wallet, you need to add a new token to the wallet on the ERC Tokens wallet tab, information about the data of which in our case is GRU can be taken on the Anouk contract page https://mainnet.revo.network/contract/034af8020b529ab8ecf3ef4744f6ed45950d97d5/I don't understand why I cannot able to add it on the new token under ERC20 using Revo core, I pasted the contract address, token name, symbol and when it comes to decimal I can't able to put zerobut the address is not a problem except for Zero decimal that is why I cannot click the confirm. Why is that? what do you think is lacking? Or is it because it is not synchronizing ing the network completely because it needs 36 weeks behind before that happen, that's what I saw in my revo wallet.

comments.author: jacko0088
comments.body: Quote from: bettercrypto on July 05, 2023, 05:42:32 AMQuote from: Daltonik on July 04, 2023, 09:54:34 AMThank you for the airdrop 100,000 Anouk(GRU) that you received, but in order for it to appear in your wallet, you need to add a new token to the wallet on the ERC Tokens wallet tab, information about the data of which in our case is GRU can be taken on the Anouk contract page https://mainnet.revo.network/contract/034af8020b529ab8ecf3ef4744f6ed45950d97d5/I don't understand why I cannot able to add it on the new token under ERC20 using Revo core, I pasted the contract address, token name, symbol and when it comes to decimal I can't able to put zerobut the address is not a problem except for Zero decimal that is why I cannot click the confirm. Why is that? what do you think is lacking? Or is it because it is not synchronizing ing the network completely because it needs 36 weeks behind before that happen, that's what I saw in my revo wallet. Hi! Yes you have to wait full sync, since revo-qt picks up automatically contract data from the chain itself. If it's not synced atleast to the smart contract deploying date, It can't recognize its own existance. But you can join TG channel and throw in your address for airdrop anyway while you Sync!
